# Ingrex

A python lib for Google Ingress including all necessary functions you need to build a bot.

Rewrite recently.

## How to

Grab your cookies from Chrome F12 or Firefox. Create a file named 'cookies' in the same path of the ingrex lib.

use the format like this:

    $ cat src/cookies
    ; csrftoken=BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBB; ingress.intelmap.shflt=viz; ingress.intelmap.lat=40.0000000000000; ingress.intelmap.lng=120.00000000000000; ingress.intelmap.zoom=16

The comm.py shows how to write a simple COMM displayer.
